meta.title: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
meta.author: Suzanne Collins

1.description: 18-year-old Capitol student struggling to maintain his family's status.

2.description: Tribute from District 12, member of the Covey band.

1.description: District 2 native at the Capitol Academy, Snow's friend.
Snow's cousin who works to support their family.
Dean of the Academy, creator of the Hunger Games concept.

recaps.1: Chapter 1 of The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes explores young Snow's transformation into a villain.
